query:
-- Jan Kowalski (UoP) - stawka 60 zł/h
UPDATE employees 
SET vacationCostMonthly = 840, 
    vacationCostAnnual = 10080
WHERE firstName = 'Jan' AND lastName = 'Kowalski' AND employmentType = 'uop';

-- Anna Nowak (B2B) - stawka 80 zł/h
UPDATE employees 
SET vacationCostMonthly = 1120,
    vacationCostAnnual = 13440
WHERE firstName = 'Anna' AND lastName = 'Nowak' AND employmentType = 'b2b';

-- Piotr Wiśniewski (UoP) - stawka 50 zł/h
UPDATE employees 
SET vacationCostMonthly = 700,
    vacationCostAnnual = 8400
WHERE firstName = 'Piotr' AND lastName = 'Wiśniewski' AND employmentType = 'uop';

-- Maria Lewandowska (Zlecenie) - stawka 45 zł/h
UPDATE employees 
SET vacationCostMonthly = 630,
    vacationCostAnnual = 7560
WHERE firstName = 'Maria' AND lastName = 'Lewandowska' AND employmentType = 'zlecenie';
